edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries
Class HistoryDisplay

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries.HistoryDisplay

public class HistoryDisplay
extends java.lang.Object

Displays a table with the history for a specific rationale element. Like other tables in SEURAT, this is based off the example described in an Eclipse Corner article. More information can be found in the RationaleTaskList code.

Nested Class Summary

          InnerClass that acts as a proxy for the HistoryList providing content for the Table.
